process.command:
plot_id bigserial,
			site_id text not null,
			elevation real,
			lon double precision,
			lat double precision,
			acquisition_date date,
			acquisition_time time,
			composition_id text,			
			primary_key(lon, lat, acquisition_date, composition_id)

plot_id bigint,
 			path smallint,
 			row smallint,
 			wrs character(1),
 			asc_desc character(1) default 'D',
 			primary_key (plot_id, path, row, wrs, asc_desc)

plot_id bigint,
 			h smallint,
 			v smallint,
 			primary_key (plot_id)
